project.name: agraph-mcp
project.description: AllegroGraph MCP Server with multi-repository support

deployment-instructions.why-exclude-node_modules: node_modules contains Linux-compiled binaries that won't work on Windows. Must run npm install on Windows after deployment.
deployment-instructions.why-exclude-src: Only compiled dist/ code is needed for production. Source TypeScript files are not required to run the server.
deployment-instructions.why-exclude-git: .git directory is large and not needed for deployment. Only production files should be deployed.
